item.description:
Movies on the Block are free outdoor movies on the corner of Westminster St and Union St (Grant's Block). http://downtownprovidence.com/2369/

It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World is a 1960s comedy about a bunch of strangers trying to find and chase after a large sum of stolen money. It sounds kind of funny and interesting, here is the trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sla845GW9YM

The movie starts at "dusk" which, when I google that, it says sunset tonight was 8:05 pm. Therefore, I am thinking we should meet around 7 or 7:30. Does anyone know what time is best to show up? It would be good to find each other and chat for a bit, get decent seats before the show starts. I'll say 7 for now, but correct me if you think that's too early! (or late.)
item.name: Movie on the Block: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
